persistence

Class XmlParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • persistence.XmlParser

  • public class XmlParser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class saves and loads XML files using the javax.xml.parsers library and DOM parser. The schema for the game's XML files is under "schema.xsd"

    This uses the Java DOM parser because: - The structure of the document is important - Elements in the document need to be sorted into specific places in collections

    Author:
    Sam Ong 300363819

    • Method Detail

      • saveFile

        public static void saveFile(java.io.File file,
                            Game game)
                     throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                            javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Static method to save a game to an XML file using DOM parser. It constructs a tree of nodes under the document builder
        Parameters:
        file - file to save the XML to
        game - game to save
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - exception thrown if parser fails
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - exception thrown is transformer fails

      • saveRoom

        private static org.w3c.dom.Element saveRoom(org.w3c.dom.Document document,
                                            int row,
                                            int col,
                                            Room room)
        Method to save a room and its properties to an element in the document.
        Parameters:
        document - document to save to
        row - y position of room in board
        col - x position of room in board
        room - Room to save
        Returns:
        the room element to append to the root

      • savePlayer

        private static org.w3c.dom.Element savePlayer(Player player,
                                              org.w3c.dom.Document document)
        Method to save a player and its properties to an element in the document.
        Parameters:
        player - player to save
        document - document to save element to
        Returns:
        player element to append to the root of the document

        public static Game parseGame(java.io.File file)
                      throws XmlParser.ParseError
        Method to parse an XML file into a game.
        Parameters:
        file - file to parse
        Returns:
        the game created from file
        Throws:
        XmlParser.ParseError - throws a parse error if the file is invalid

                              Room[][] board)
                       throws XmlParser.ParseError
        A method to parse rooms into the game.
        Parameters:
        room - XML node element for the room
        board - board to place room in
        Throws:
        XmlParser.ParseError - throws a parse error if room element is invalid

                                  Room[][] board)
                           throws XmlParser.ParseError
        A method to parse the player into the game.
        Parameters:
        playerNode - XML node element for the player
        board - board to find the room to place player in
        Returns:
        player in the game
        Throws:
        XmlParser.ParseError - throws a parse error if player element is invalid

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • parseItems

        private static void parseItems(org.w3c.dom.NodeList items,
                               Tile[][] tiles,
                               Player p)
                        throws XmlParser.ParseError
        A method to parse items from an element.
        Parameters:
        items - the node list to get the items from
        tiles - tiles in the room that can be set with items
        p - player to give item to
        Throws:
        XmlParser.ParseError - throws a parse error if item element is invalid

                                    Tile[][] tiles)
                             throws XmlParser.ParseError
        A method to parse each challenge and set their tiles.
        Parameters:
        challengeList - the node list to get challenges from
        tiles - tiles in the room that can be set with challenges
        Throws:
        XmlParser.ParseError - throws parse error
